alert.note: Alert for Catalina and Santa Barbara Islands; Eastern San Fernando Valley; Lake Casitas; Los Angeles County Beaches; Los Angeles County Inland Coast including Downtown Los Angeles; Ojai Valley; Palos Verdes Hills (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued November 19 at 11:58AM PST until November 19 at 8:00PM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM PST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...North to Northwest winds 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 40 mph. * WHERE...Catalina and Santa Barbara Islands, Lake Casitas, Ojai Valley, Los Angeles County Beaches, Palos Verdes Hills, Los Angeles County Inland Coast including Downtown Los Angeles and Eastern San Fernando Valley. * WHEN...Until 8 PM PST this evening. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds could blow down large objects such as trees and power lines. Power outages are possible. Travel could be difficult, especially for drivers of high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Strongest near the foothills.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Catalina and Santa Barbara Islands; Eastern San Fernando Valley; Lake Casitas; Los Angeles County Beaches; Los Angeles County Inland Coast including Downtown Los Angeles; Ojai Valley; Palos Verdes Hills
